input.sentences: hank 's fifth birthday was celebrated at the location stadium .
he was so excited to be seeing such a large stadium without any people around .
he played ball with his sister [female] .
they met the redsox mascot and got to take pictures with him .
they finished off their day with an ice cream sundae and a soda .
output.sentences: Hank was placed in a location in the stadium.
People were very excited about the game at the stadium.
The female sister played with her brother at the stadium.
Pictures were taken when the family met the Red Sox Mascot.
Everyone enjoyed soda with ice and a sundae after the game.
